review: I returned it. Apple TV worked better

review: Great little gadget. It works as advertised but I have been experiencing some lags while browsing the interface. Also this device does not work when powered by USB. It powers on but it gets stuck in an infinite boot.
author: Harry

review: Great I love the fire stick.

review: I love the Amazon Fire Stick, since I got it I have not watched cable. And if you are Amazon prime member you have a lot of options, absolutely in love with it
author: Roland Munich

review: Love it!  Easy set up and...who needs cable TV?

review: Far exceeded my expectations with the easy set up and use!!!
